attributes.action: do what he does best and order a study into why the population of this country does not respond in the same way as the populations of France and Germany when their governments conduct activities which are only half as unpopular to them as the activities of our current government makes it the most reviled political organisation we have ever had.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The streets of Paris often resound to french people protesting and burning cars in response to what their government does, or tries to do.  How come that has NEVER happened in this country, except for the Poll Tax Riots.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
